Posts.Title: IS chemo effective? This FREAKED me out! Pls tell me it's NUTS! Shellies Lily55

Posts.Content: Shellies wrote: PLEASE tell me this site is wacko!  http://preventdisease.com/news/14/033114_97-Percent-of-The-Time-Chemotherapy-Does-Not-Work.shtml  It is FREAKING me out!  "97% of chemo is not effective"... ""90% of the patients will die in 10 - 15 years because of chemo"...     Dx 11/28/2011, IDC, 1cm, Stage IIA, Grade 1, 1/36 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2- Surgery 1/16/2012 Mastectomy: Left, Right Hormonal Therapy 2/13/2012 Chemotherapy 4/9/2012 Cytoxan (cyclophosphamide), Taxotere (docetaxel) Surgery 7/23/2012 Reconstruction (right): Latissimus dorsi flap Surgery 10/19/2012 Prophylactic ovary removal Log in to post a reply
